name: web-ecom-monorepo
description: E-commerce application with NestJS backend and React frontend

scripts.dev: pnpm run dev:setup && concurrently -n "shared-types,frontend,backend" -c "yellow,cyan,green" "pnpm run shared-types:dev" "pnpm run frontend:dev" "pnpm run backend:dev"
scripts.dev:setup: pnpm run shared-types:build && pnpm run backend:build
scripts.dev:backend-full: pnpm run dev:setup && concurrently -n "shared-types,backend" -c "yellow,green" "pnpm run shared-types:dev" "pnpm run backend:dev"
scripts.dev:frontend-only: pnpm run shared-types:build && concurrently -n "shared-types,frontend" -c "yellow,cyan" "pnpm run shared-types:dev" "pnpm run frontend:dev"
